Landing Page Launched

We are proud to announce the launch of FRED2’s own landing page. We will keep you updated on new developments and upcoming releases. If you want to get involved int developing FRED2 further, or have some questions and comments, feel free to contact us (schubert@informatik.uni-tuebingen.de) or open up an issue at our GitHub repository.

Written by Benjamin Schubert

PhD Student at Applied Bioinformatics Group University of Tübingen
